channel.title: Everything Microsoft 365 related
channel.description: Recent content on Everything Microsoft 365 related

item.title: About Us
item.description: Jeroen Burgerhout [images] src = “img/about/Jeroen_head and shoulders.png” alt = “Jeroen Burgerhout” Jeroen Burgerhout is a Microsoft Cloud Consultant at SKS Professionals and he is a Microsoft Certified Trainer. Jeroen has great technical experience in Microsoft products. He is specialized in Azure, Azure AD, Microsoft Endpoint Management (aka Intune), Microsoft365, Windows 10, and Windows Server. In 2020, Jeroen published a Microsoft Exam MD-100 Windows 10 Certification Guide, which is available through Packt or Amazon.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.
